name: Brain Fried
description:
Brain Fried is a chaotic restaurant simulator where you, Man, try to serve up customers ranging from angry Karens, all the way to hungry little sh*ts. You need to survive until the end of your shift in order to maintain (partial) peace and order. If you fail, all hell and chaos will break loose, and you go insane.

This game was for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, and the theme was "Let there be chaos".

lemail-music - Music

GoldenTrashCan - Literally Everything Else (Programming Art, etc.)
